attributes.action: bring back Top of the Pops!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A few years ago we were listening on a Friday night around 6pm to the artists performing their new singles. Now we have to listen to the radio and even that is biased in a way. Top of the Pops had it all...Disco music, Rock 'n Roll, R 'n B, Hip hop, Rap, New Rock, Gangsta Rap, Cheese, girl and boy bands, you name it, they've had it on their programme.

I was a fan of Top of the Pops and it made me sick that some beaurocratic members of the Beebs board had the cheek to take it off

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
